message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product. Given its high value and quality, we believe it is worth $12000. We are offering you this exceptional opportunity at a special introductory price of $11000. We understand the importance of value for money and trust this offer reflects our commitment to providing you with the best possible deal.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the introductory price, $11000 is still slightly above my budget.  I'm interested in this product, and I'm willing to pay $10500.  Let me know if you're open to that price.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to engage in negotiations. In light of your offer, we would like to extend a counteroffer of $10800 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while maintaining the value of our product. We hope this proposal aligns better with your budget.
